biotools.summary:
Epitranscriptome Target Prediction and Functional Characterization of a sequence-based N6-methyladenosine (m6A) modification site predictor.

Among the various types of RNA modification, the methylation of adenosine at the N6 position (m6A) is characterized as the most abundant post-transcriptional modification in mRNA.
